article.title: SAIC Awarded $50 Million Contract to Support Navy Reserve Forces Command
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a contract by the Fleet and Industrial Supply Center Norfolk, Philadelphia Office, to provide professional support services to the commander, U.S. Navy Reserve Forces Command. The contract has a total value of $50 million if all options are exercised. SAIC will provide services that include strategy, information technology, logistics, maintenance, engineering analysis and training.
